W08_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W08_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_TITLE.text: Cordycep: The World inside a Hole

W08_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found cramped space thought to be underground on the other side of the door. How is someone supposed to find a spirit's power in a place like this? I mean, how do you even get around?
